Package org.lwjgl.stb

Contains bindings to stb, a set of single-file public domain libraries.

    An opaque structure which holds all the context needed from STBTruetype.stbtt_PackBegin(org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTPackContext, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, int, int, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer) to STBTruetype.stbtt_PackEnd(org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTPackContext).

    An array of STBTTPackContext structs.

    STBTTPackedchar.Buffer
    An array of STBTTPackedchar structs.
    STBTTPackRange
    A range of packed character data, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_PackFontRanges(org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTPackContext, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTPackRange.Buffer, int)
    STBTTPackRange.Buffer
    An array of STBTTPackRange structs.

    Information about a Vorbis stream.

Package org.lwjgl.stb Description

Contains bindings to stb, a set of single-file public domain libraries.

The functionality provided by stb includes:

  • Parsing TrueType files, extract glyph metrics and rendering packed font textures.
  • Easy rendering of bitmap fonts.
  • Reading/writing image files and resizing images (e.g. for gamma-correct MIP map creation).
  • Decoding Ogg Vorbis audio files.
  • Compressing DXT textures at runtime.
  • Packing rectangular textures into texture atlases.
  • Computing Perlin noise.
